<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Service Training">b7f1c31f1b4801d05b1b411acd4bcbca</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OnLoad - Get Company Name of User</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
	var cur_user = g_form.getValue('internal_user');

    var ga = new GlideAjax('User_Company');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserCompany');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_user', cur_user);
    ga.getXML(getResponse);

    function getResponse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		
		var str = JSON.parse(answer);
		
		g_form.setValue('account',str.accountcompanyId,str.companyName); 
		
//      g_form.addInfoMessage(answer);
//		g_form.addInfoMessage(str.companyName);
//		g_form.addInfoMessage(str.accountcompanyId);
               
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cocbom0</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-01 11:55:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7e462cc41bdf8150191cd8f99a4bcb58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>48</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OnLoad - Get Company Name of User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7e462cc41bdf8150191cd8f99a4bcb58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>cocbom0</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-04 14:53:50</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
